DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness Erythrina mulungu control anxiety patient undergoing bilateral extraction asymptomatic , impacted mandibular third molar .
DOC.detailed_description: : In research , characterize randomize , double-blind , crossover study , 30 healthy volunteer patient ( 05 men 25 woman ) age 18 old receive capsule 500mg Mulungu Matusa Â® placebo , orally , one hour procedure select . The level anxiety assess questionnaire physical parameter , blood pressure , heart rate oxygen concentration . Data collect , tabulate analyzed following statistical test : chi-square , t-test , ANOVA Tukey test , Friedman , Fisher 's exact test significance level 5 % .
DOC.criteria: indication bilateral extraction asymptomatic , impacted mandibular third molar patient age 18 general health problem base medical history physical examination history use medication within 15 day begin research history hypersensitivity drug , substance material use experiment pregnancy lactation history pericoronitis
